subtitle1: Experience a revolution in your procurement process with Propon.me, a state-of-the-art decentralized application (dApp) that leverages the power of Blockchain technology to redefine transparency, fairness, and efficiency
subtitle2: Our solution is not just about making RFP / tender processes transparent and fair, it is about reshaping the future of your procurement, creating new benchmarks for cost-efficiency, and instilling unwavering trust in every transaction
ap_title3: The innovative platform  to post and respond to RFPs
metamaskwarning: Metamask wallet not found (read-only mode only)
changenetwork: You are not connected to Polygon Network Blockchain
title_instructions: Build  the future,  let your footprint on blockchain, tell your story in 4 setps
click_on_connect_wallet: Click on Connect Wallet to connect your wallet to the app
start_creating_or_bidding_on_rfps: Start creating an offer on RFPs!
enter_new_era_of_fairness: Enter the era of fairness and transparency in the management of RFPs. Break the boundaries of centralization, use Propon.me to ensure tracking and visibility of every transaction, proposal, and decision being recorded and verified to foster trust, fairness, and full transparency
data_documents_fortified: All data and documents received are encrypted and stored securely on the Blockchain. Your RFPs and bids are tamper-proof, ensuring the integrity of the procurement process step by step
upon_completion_of_rfp: All documents, except confidential ones, are available for audit by interested incumbents, external auditors, news media and the general public. In addition to ensuring integrity, it builds trust across the ecosystem of participants. Demonstrating that it is an open, equitable, fair and totally transparent process, strengthening the reputation of the entity that uses it
create_immutable_trail: Welcome to Web3. Create an immutable trail of your organization's activities, contribute to your manifest commitment to integrity and good business practices. As you navigate digital transformation and transparency, Propon.me will become your main tool that will build and confirm your trustworthiness, your reputation, and the verifiability of your operations
global_marketplace_description: Connect and expand your supply sources with a diverse range of world-class suppliers, stimulate and foster a competitive, dynamic and transparent environment that allows you to get the best out of each participant
digital_signing_description: Each document is unique and signed using a cryptocurrency wallet account; incorporating the authenticity that allows it to be verified by anyone, without repudiation. Ideal for a variety of business applications such as contracts and other legal documents
confidentiality_description: All your documents will remain completely confidential until the RFP closing period, ensuring a level and transparent playing field and context for all contestants
traceability_description: All history is stored on the blockchain, rather than in a silo as is traditionally done
benefits: The proposal documents are digital and cryptographically signed
No documents will be revealed until the closing period of the contest
The document password is delivered only to those responsible for the process
Play fair by adding more transparency to your quoting processes
instructions_title: Click button to register on Propon.me
instructions: Create your Company Profile - you will be the administrator
Create a Bid Contest and add RFPs documents
Invite your suppliers to send their proposals via Propon.me
addingnetwork: Your wallet does not have working network configured, adding it now, please allow
notsupportedbrowser: This Browser does not support this operation, use last versions of Google Chrome or Winodws Edge
site_for_polygon: This site incorporates the use of smart contracts on the Polygon Blockchain network and stores all documents on the Arweave Blockchain.
connect_wallet_prompt: You must connect your wallet to this application
click_connect_wallet: Click the 'connect wallet' button in the header
enter_password: Enter the password to unlock it if required
accept_connection: Accept the connection, don't worry, it won't cause charges
permission_stayed: The permissions granted will be recorded for subsequent sessions
consult_rfps: You can consult RFPs/Tenders, however you need to install a Metamask wallet to register
click_header: Click on the header button to get the Metamask wallet to go to its installation page
install_metamask: Install Metamask and create an account on the Polygon Blockchain network
get_matic: Get MATIC cryptocurrencies to use this application
backup_keys: It is important that you back up your Metamask keys as your wallet is the only means to access your registration on
lose_access: If you lose access to your Wallet there is no other way to recover it
no_signup: Just want to review RFPs? No problem!
browse_rfp: No need to sign up for that. Go ahead and browse through Companies and RFPs from the menu
the_new_way: Blockchain. A door to a new way to do Business
email_notif_formtitle: Add your contact emails from Companies that you are interested in participating in the RFP. If you have an account installed in this device, you will achieve better communication if you send them from your own email account
input_email_tooltip: Introduce company's email and press ENTER or click on Icon âŠ•
notify_tooltip: Notify unregistered companies through email of this RFP
notify_new_tooltip: Open a form to capture companies email and send them notification to register to Propon
send_email_tooltip: We will send notification email from our server, tell your contacts to whitelist no-reply@propon.me
prepare_email_tooltip: Create the email and invoke my own email client (we will do our best to call it, you must check your email client)
email_prepare_ok: The notification was created in your email client and may take time to open, depending on your system. Review and send it
issuer_notified: The issuer of the RFP has been notified
companies_without_email: These companies have not registered an Admin email yet. Send them an email as New Companies to notify them
beta_testing: This Application is in Beta testing on the Mumbai testnet, you can create and publish RFPs, contact us at propon@mail.com
header_1: Welcome to our Blockchain RFP Application
subHeader1: Our platform leverages the power of blockchain technology to bring transparency and fairness to your Request for Proposals (RFPs). Post your RFPs and associated documents directly on the Blockchain
solutions: When conducting RFP business there are problems to be addressed, specially if your industry regulations requiere transparency
bul_sol4: Unwanted disclosure of documents before time
secure_subtitle: Designates a single administrator to steer the platform, ensuring integrity and streamlined management
sol_bul1: A single Administrator will seamlessly upload documents, announce RFPs, and handle all essential communications
sol_bul2: Propon is not just another RFP manager; it is a Web3 distributed application that creates a bridge between RFP Issuers and Bidders, utilizing Blockchain to coordinate activities related to RFPs
sol_bul3: Ensure immutability and transparency for every blockchain transaction and interaction, eliminating concerns of bias, unfair advantages, and premature document disclosure
secure: Secure and Fair RFP Coordination with Propon
subtitle: Centralized Control, Decentralized Trust
